reviews.customers_say: Customers love this sweater vest's pear design and find it well-made for the price. The soft material and lovely colors make it perfect for fall, with one customer noting it elevates winter outfits. The size receives mixed feedback - while some find it true to size, others say it runs a little big. The fit also gets mixed reviews, with some finding it nice while others say it's odd.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Sweater Vest
items.body: Love the pear sweater vest! The material is soft and doesn‚Äôt feel inexpensive. I‚Äôm happy with the quality and fit. The green is amazing! Read more
items.author: LDock

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality! Love it!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. So cute! I ordered the large and probably could have gone with the medium, but I love it! So soft. Quality material and fit. I ordered the red but it comes in several other colors. Great value for the money! Looks expensive! Would make a great fall fit or Thanksgiving outfit! Read more
items.author: kerri staggers

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty. Downsize x2 sizes
items.body: First very big. I had to exchange twice. I wear a medium and downsized to an XS. It‚Äôs still a bit over sized. Quality is nice Read more
items.author: Laura Harrison

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy little üçê
items.body: I love this cute design. .perfect fall vest for added layer...I am 5'4"...135#... bought a medium...it feels a little big...if you want a closer fit, maybe size down...quality materials ...laundered several times, no sign of loose threads or such....very happy with this purchase...get many compliments when I wear... Read more
items.author: Karen Zola

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Take a chance, you will love it!!
items.body: Sometimes when you order an item of clothing off Amazon you just don‚Äôt know what you are going to get. This sweater vest really delivers. It looks just like the images. This sweater is soft and cozy, thick. Really cute. If you are on the fence, just take a chance and just get it. You will not be disappointed. The price point is on the mark! For size reference, I am 5‚Äô4‚Äù, 150#, athletic build. I ordered a large but could have easily gotten away with a medium. I like my clothing baggy. Read more
items.author: D. Randall

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars I wish this had fit well!
items.body: I really like this, but the fit was not good...Usually I am a 2X, but I purchased this in XL. Not only was it way to big, it was sort of shapeless. I don't think a size down would have been better, either. I even tried it with an undershirt and it still didn't look good. It was really cute and soft though! Read more
items.author: whitlee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it! High quality, beautiful rich color & so so comfy
items.body: I got xs but returned for xxs, just depends on how you like it to fit. Firstly, material quality is top notch. The color is magnificent in person, it's warm, feels expensive but also durable. I wore with a fitted dark brown long sleeve shirt under it & jeans, I felt great in it & had tons of compliments. It's even better in person than in pics. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect weight, true to size, Cute!
items.body: I have wanted this and finally bought it. I LOVE it! Its the perfect weight for layering, not bulky at all. The colors are lovely and the image is cute. You should buy it! Read more
items.author: Patti Nolan | Alpaca Valley Life

short_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Dark Navy, Cream, Olive Green, Champagne, Coffee, Navy Blue, Red, White & Wine, Solid Navy Blue, Khaki, Pink, White, Beige. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
